resources.string: Guide the pieces into place.\nKeep the jiggleometer low to clear.\nSmash pieces with the ball.
Click for open Source Software we depend on! (Licenses)
If you had fun, why not rate us on the Play Store? Thanks!
Found a bug? Game crashed? Click here to report it!

News. JellyCram is currently in Beta, so there may be some bugs or issues. If you find any it would really help if you report them at: jerboa.app/jellycram-bugs. Any feedback you can give, on Google Play or the link above, is also greatly appreciated!. Thanks for playing!
